name: Just Another Day (M. Bison)
description: This is an interactive experience that allows you to live a day as the life of Drew Rydberg the game developer. I made this as a way to review what I do everyday and to give people an idea of what I do. Throughout the game you will make many difficult decisions that will affect your day. I have actually made this games decisions based off of many decisions that I have to make throughout my daily life so that I can express the pain of living the same day with the same choices every day.
